name: Milk Loss Program
objective: The Milk Loss program will indemnify eligible dairy operations for milk that was dumped or removed without compensation from the commercial milk market due to qualifying weather events in 2020, 2021, and 2022 calendar years due to drought, wildfires, hurricanes, floods, derechos, excessive heat, winter storms, freeze, including a polar vortex, and smoke exposure.  Milk Loss assists America’s farmers and ranchers recover from these storms and disasters.

results.description: In 2024, provided affected dairy operations that dumped milk without compensation for milk losses that occurred in 2020, 2021 and 2022, for the full value of the dumped milk.
